com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities

Class OAuthActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.box.boxandroidlibv2.activities.OAuthActivity

  • public class OAuthActivity
extends Activity
    Activity for OAuth. Use this activity by using the intent from createOAuthActivityIntent method. On completion, this activity will put the parcelable BoxAndroidClient into activity result. In case of failing, the activity result will be Activity#RESULT_CANCELED together will a error message in intent extra.
